Target: OntoProfile is designed to represent the profiles of organizations and people, inclusive of their names, roles, and responsibilities.

Comment: A person who is employed to drive a vehicle.
Label: Driver

Comment: A person who is employed to manage and supervise the operational conditions of a service.
Label: Operation manager

Comment: A person who is employed to manage the operational schedule of a service.
Label: Operation scheduler

Comment: A person who is employed to communicate with clients about the company's products and/or services. The person is primarily based at the front-desk.
Label: Sales admin

Comment: A person who has a membership role within an educational institution, typically enrolled in a course of study or program, and is involved in learning or training activities under the supervision of educators.
Label: Student

Comment: The initials of a person are the first letters of their first name and last name (and sometimes middle name).
Label: Initials

Comment: The work availability of an employee.
Label: Employee status

Comment: A relationship that describes a person's initials.
Label: has initials

Comment: A relationship describing the facility that the organisation is using for any of their operational needs.
Label: has facility

Comment: A relationship describing the facility that the employee is working in.
Label: works at

Comment: A relationship describing the current status of an employee.
Label: has status
